xyz.fsgik.common.base.ref

类 FsRef<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • xyz.fsgik.common.base.ref.FsRef<T>
  • 类型参数:
    T - type of referenced instance

    public class FsRef<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    Denote a variable reference for an object, usually be used where the variable cannot be re-assigned. For example: 
         String str = "a";
     FsRef<String> ref = FsRef.of("a");
     map.computeIfAbsent(key, it -> {
         str = "other"; //error: cannot re-assigned variable str!
         ref.set("other");
         //...
     });
